basics.name: Zhonghao Neo
basics.summary: Experienced Machine Learning Engineer specializing in building and deploying enterprise applications. Proven track record in driving business impact through scalable and reliable digital solutions for regulated industries, especially in the finance and healthcare sectors.

work.name: Sourced, An Amdocs Company
work.summary: Designing and implementing complex systems and applications that meet the client's business needs
highlights: Generated at least USD 1.5M revenue for the company during entire tenure.
Architected data strategy for a highly regulated tier-1 global financial institution.

work.name: Sourced, An Amdocs Company
work.summary: Developing, implementing, and maintaining data analytics applications and systems
highlights: Deployed an anti-money laundering (AML) platform in a USD 10M project for a leading ASEAN bank.

work.name: AI Singapore
work.summary: Automating and optimizing the processes involved in building, testing, deploying, and monitoring ML applications
highlights: Developed a simplified and automated deployment framework, translatating to at least 10% savings in cost.

work.name: BioMind
work.summary: Applying state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms to healthcare industry
highlights: Published paper on image segmentation with CNN to identify cerebral aneurysms

certificates.name: Databricks Certified Associate Developer for Apache Spark

publications.name: Deep neural network-based detection and segmentation of intracranial aneurysms on 3D rotational DSA
publications.publisher: SAGE Publications Sage UK: London, England
publications.summary: This study aims to develop a 3D convolutional neural network (CNN) model to detect and segment intracranial aneurysms (IA) on 3D rotational DSA (3D-RA) images.

references.name: Mark Burnard
references.reference: Zhong Hao was instrumental in helping deliver some of our most complex and highly visible projects, including a customized anti-money laundering (AML) solution for a tier one bank in the region, applying machine learning techniques on a petabyte scale data lake. I have no hesitation in recommending Zhong Hao to any future employer

references.name: Aaron Lauer
references.reference: I had the distinct privilege of directly managing and working side-by-side with Zhonghao on some of the most innovative Cloud data platforms in Singapore. His drive to always improve and learn put our projects into the forefront of management teams at some of the largest banks in Singapore. Zhonghao will be a major asset to any organization that hires him.

references.name: Salman Syed
references.reference: I have worked with Zhonghao as a project partner at Georgia Tech, and throughout my long interaction with him, I can vouch for his goal-driven nature and work ethic. Once his mind is set on a goal, he works meticulously towards it, often exceeding those goals. He is adaptable and has the ability to lead any future project with excellence.
